import json
from datetime import datetime

class Character:
    def __init__(self, name, char_class, level, health, experience):
        self.name = name
        self.char_class = char_class
        self.level = level
        self.health = health
        self.experience = experience
    
    def __str__(self):
        return f"{self.name} ({self.char_class}) Lv{self.level}"

# TODO: Implement character_to_dict(character)
def character_to_dict(character):
    """Convert Character object to dictionary"""
    return {
        "name": character.name,
        "char_class": character.char_class,
        "level": character.level,
        "health": character.health,
        "experience": character.experience
    }

# TODO: Implement dict_to_character(data)
def dict_to_character(data):
    """Create Character object from dictionary"""
    return Character(
        data["name"],
        data["char_class"],
        data["level"],
        data["health"],
        data["experience"]
    )

# TODO: Implement save_party(party, filename)
def save_party(party, filename="party.json"):
    """Save list of Characters to JSON"""
    party_data = [character_to_dict(char) for char in party]
    json_output = json.dumps(party_data, indent=2)
    print(f"Party saved!\n{json_output}")
    return json_output

# TODO: Implement load_party(json_string)
def load_party(json_string):
    """Load Characters from JSON string"""
    party_data = json.loads(json_string)
    return [dict_to_character(char_data) for char_data in party_data]

# Demo

import json
from datetime import datetime

class Character:
    def __init__(self, name, char_class, level, health, experience):
        self.name = name
        self.char_class = char_class
        self.level = level
        self.health = health
        self.experience = experience
    
    def __str__(self):
        return f"{self.name} ({self.char_class}) Lv{self.level}"

def character_to_dict(character):
    return {
        "name": character.name,
        "char_class": character.char_class,
        "level": character.level,
        "health": character.health,
        "experience": character.experience
    }

def dict_to_character(data):
    return Character(
        data["name"],
        data["char_class"],
        data["level"],
        data["health"],
        data["experience"]
    )

def save_party(party, filename="party.json"):
    party_data = [character_to_dict(char) for char in party]
    json_output = json.dumps(party_data, indent=2)
    print(f"Party saved!\n{json_output}")
    return json_output

def load_party(json_string):
    party_data = json.loads(json_string)
    return [dict_to_character(char_data) for char_data in party_data]

print("=== Character Save System ===")
print()

party = [
    Character("Warrior", "warrior", 10, 150, 890),
    Character("Mage", "mage", 12, 70, 1100),
    Character("Rogue", "rogue", 11, 100, 950)
]
